QuestData.Title: Patterns Within Patterns
QuestData.Description:
We stand at the origin of the Shadowlands. We must not allow this place to become its undoing.
Work with our new allies, $n. Their assistance will be the difference between our success and the unmaking of all things.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist your allies in Zereth Mortis by completing World Quests, Daily Quests, looting treasures, and slaying rare creatures.
QuestData.RewardText: We move closer to our goal. Ever onward.
